name: archipelago-games-viewer
description: Visualizzatore della libreria di giochi Archipelago con copertine

scripts.serve: node -e "require('http').createServer((req, res) => { const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); let filePath = '.' + req.url; if (filePath === './') filePath = './index.html'; const extname = path.extname(filePath); const contentType = { '.html': 'text/html', '.js': 'text/javascript', '.css': 'text/css', '.json': 'application/json', '.png': 'image/png', '.jpg': 'image/jpg', '.gif': 'image/gif', '.svg': 'image/svg+xml', '.ico': 'image/x-icon' }[extname] || 'application/octet-stream'; fs.readFile(filePath, (error, content) => { if (error) { res.writeHead(404); res.end('404 Not Found'); } else { res.writeHead(200, { 'Content-Type': contentType }); res.end(content, 'utf-8'); } }); }).listen(8080, () => console.log('Server running at http://localhost:8080/'))"
